name: TrustEgg
long_description:
TrustEgg is the simple, social way to save for a child's future.

TrustEgg will dramatically change the US savings rate, one child at a time.

TrustEgg enables parents to create a Trust for their child in minutes for free. Parents can invite family and friends to make contributions. The Trust Fund is invested with Vanguard and earns a market rate of return until the child turns 18.

The simple, social nature of TrustEgg will dramatically change the savings rate for the 70+ million children in the US.
one_liner: Trust funds.

name: OctaveWealth
long_description:
We’ll build the 401(k) you need to help attract and retain talent.

OctaveWealth is operated by Quillu Inc, an SEC registered Investment Advisor.
one_liner: The 401(k) that helps you grow

name: Plate IQ
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Emeryville, CA, USA
long_description:
Plate IQ makes accounts payable simple.

Automated accounts payable software replaces manual data entry by digitizing your invoices down to the line item, automatically assigning them your proper GL codes, syncing the information to your accounting software, and providing analytics around purchasing. Plate IQ also offers one-click bill pay, inventory, and cloud-based data storage that allows businesses to go paperless.
one_liner: Automated Accounts Payable

name: Algoriz
long_description:
Algoriz is an AI based trading platform that enables you to build trading algorithms by simply typing your strategies in English. 

Algoriz is backed by Y combinator.
one_liner: Algoriz is an AI based algorithmic trading platform that enables you…

name: Penny
long_description:
Penny is a personal finance app that helps you track your income and spending.

Penny accesses your statement history—with your permission—and uses that information to help you manage your finances. Whenever you open the app, she’ll chat with you about your finances: letting you know how you’re doing this month, forecasting where you’ll be next month, giving you a heads up about upcoming bills, or even helping you cancel services you don’t use.

Penny makes finances less intimidating and stressful. Many apps have lots of useful features, but they’re often hard to use and time-consuming. Penny automatically organizes your finances, explains them simply and clearly, and tells you what you need to know, when you need to know it.
one_liner: Penny makes keeping track of your finances as easy as having a…

name: Piggy
long_description:
Experience an easy way to make Investments in Mutual funds in India.

Easiest platform to make mutual fund investments in India.
Because you need to make Investments, be it just to park your cash short term to earn better returns, or to invest for your goals or retirement, we've made an easy to use platform for you where you can invest in any fund in India in few clicks and have track your existing investments.

Furthermore , you make investments without paying any middlemen commissions and make more returns . After all, It is your money. Don't pay too much to others when you can do it on your own.

We're on both Android and iOS . download the app to get started 
https://piggy.co.in
one_liner: App for Indians to make investments in mutual funds, manage their…

name: OkCredit
long_description:
Today, over 50 million SMBs issue informal credit in India, This is a hugely manual process which they spend hours tracking, reconciling, and collecting! 

The 50M SMBs in India account for 40% of the nation’s GDP. As much as 60% of their sales happen on credit. That’s ~24% of the country’s GDP (500B$) lying on paper!

OKCREDIT as a company came into existence to start solving the most important problem of credit recovery in MSMEs. We as first movers developed a bookkeeping app that would help any merchant sitting at the remotest corner of the country with internet connectivity to record his transactions digitally. We helped them track the credit given to their customers and suppliers. With our Okcredit app a merchant can track the amount of credit given, monitor credit limit, send reminders and eventually can collect faster from their customers. So as a company our vision was to bring the data dark merchants onto the digital platform. We have changed the way the MSMEs record the transactions and eased their life today.
one_liner: Simple and secure bookkeeping for Indian businesses.

name: Chaser
long_description: Our users use our tool to build Zendesk, Salesforce, and Slack apps without an engineering background.
one_liner: No code app builder.

name: Thrive Agric
long_description: We have created a market place that enables the sales of agro-commodities locally and internationally while providing rural farmers with all the resources they will need to grow crops like loans to but inputs and the needed extension services for better insights.
one_liner: ThriveAgric help Farmers in Africa access finance, insight and Markets

name: Seawise Capital
long_description: Seawise Capital is a trade finance company for Indian exporters. We provide SME's working capital against the strength of their international customers. We are able to provide these businesses with collateral-free capital by discounting invoices from their large overseas customers.
one_liner: Trade finance company for Indian exporters

name: Apero Health
long_description:
We help healthcare companies run their practices.  Eligibility, BI, claims, patient payments?  Shoot us an email at founders@aperohealth.com

Apero is a Y-Combinator-backed startup based in San Francisco bringing transparency and ease to medical billing.  As one of the top startups from the Summer 2019 Y Combinator batch, we have raised from well-known investors including the creator of Gmail Paul Buchheit and the founders of Doctor on Demand, Gusto and Reddit, and serve startups that have raised over $1B in Venture Capital.

The founding team are Stanford CS and Berkeley grads and include the CTO of Doctor on Demand having helped raised $240m and process millions of video calls.  We are also hiring  for engineers and product-minded operations people interested in giving price transparency to patients and providers.

We serve practices nationwide, and integrate with leading EHRs as well.
one_liner: Modern medical billing

name: Proof Trading
one_liner: Institutional equities broker-dealer

name: Finlens
long_description:
Finlens is an AI co-pilot for QuickBooks, built for founders and accounting firms who want faster closes, real-time visibility, and clean books without the spreadsheet chaos.

We automate categorisation, GAAP schedules, and collaboration, all on top of your existing QuickBooks setup. No migrations. No change management. Just a smarter way to work with the stack you already use.

Backed by Y Combinator (W20) and Accel.
Built by second-time founders who’ve seen the finance backend break — and decided to rebuild it.
one_liner: AI Accounting for Founders & Accountants

name: yearend
long_description: YearEnd helps startup employees optimize their equity and taxes, and can also file their tax returns. They simply connect their financial accounts and YearEnd will tell them how much tax they’ll owe and will make recommendations on how to make better decisions. At the end of the year, YearEnd can also file their tax return for them or they can collaborate with their existing tax accountant.
one_liner: Optimize your equity and taxes in real-time.

name: Modernbanc
long_description: Simple to set-up, flexible and powerful platform to manage your business finances
one_liner: Accounting software that works for you

name: Blue Onion
long_description: Blue Onion is the data backbone for tomorrow’s AI-powered finance teams — a subledger platform that transforms messy, scattered transactions into clean, reconciled, and automation-ready data.
one_liner: Financial data layer for AI-powered finance and accounting

name: Hapi
long_description:
Hapi democratizes investing for consumers in Latin America.

We let anyone from Latam easily invest in stocks, ETFs and cryptos in under 5 minutes, with no minimums and no commissions.
one_liner: Stocks and cryptos trading app with zero commissions and no minimums…

name: Pry Financials
long_description:
Pry makes it simple for companies to manage their budget, hiring plan, financial models, and cash runway.

Today, most people plan for their business once a quarter. It's done in Excel - buggy, boring, confusing, and really time-expensive. A lot of people have tried to solve this and only found moderate success or failed.

We're the team to do it right.
one_liner: Finance for Founders

name: Reclaim Protocol
long_description:
Reclaim Protocol is a verification company that leverages advances in AI and cryptography to bring you global, instantaneous and compliant verifications at the industry lowest costs.

Using Reclaim Protocol, you can verify :
- Education : Which university is this student enrolled in? 20k+ universities globally supported
- Employment : Where is the user employed and what is their designation? Employers in all countries supported
- Finances : What is the Credit Score and Accredited Investor status of the user? Again, all countries supported
- Shopping : Where is the user spending, and what brands are they loyal to? Supporting all major ecommerce and travel services

Once you integrate Reclaim Protocol, your users will be presented with a button similar to "Login with Google", but for the website from where we need to verify information. e.g. their university portal, their tax portals and so on.
As soon as they login, Reclaim Protocol extracts the required information and verifies the integrity of it. Particularly, ensures that the user has not tampered with the data that was displayed by the website.

The verification is done using zero knowledge proofs using an open sourced library!
one_liner: Industry's first sub-dollar user data verification company!

name: Hyperseed
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Austin, TX, USA; Remote
long_description:
Hyperseed is the Zapier for billing. 
 
We help companies handle their custom billing workflows without code and instead, with spreadsheet formulas. Hyperseed replaces manual work borne of billing system limitations and lets companies avoid spending engineering resources on homegrown systems.
one_liner: Zapier for billing

name: Levro
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; New York, NY, USA
long_description:
Levro is a multicurrency account and global payments platform for businesses. We help US & international companies hold, convert, and pay 30+ currencies. Our exchange at rates are 40-90% lower than banks and FX services like Wise. We also offer free currency risk management, recipient onboarding, automated multicurrency reconciliation, and wire tracking.

If you have international customers, employee payroll, vendors, or bulk payouts to different countries please send us a note! founders@levro.com
one_liner: Multicurrency account & international payments for businesses

name: Aqua
long_description: An end-to-end platform that allows financial advisors to put their clients into curated alternative assets without additional operational lift.
one_liner: The Modern Way for Financial Advisors to Put Their Clients into Alts

name: Aleph
long_description:
Aleph helps top finance teams work with their data in real time. Businesses can automate financial models and streamline budgeting and forecasting with the fastest-to-implement FP&A platform. Aleph eliminates the need to export data from multiple sources by syncing spreadsheet models with data from 150+ integrations, and allows teams to interact with their data in no-code dashboards.

From annual budgeting to ad hoc reporting, scale your financial processes faster with better data without expanding your team. See why over 90% of people who start a trial with Aleph become customers!
one_liner: One source of truth for financial data.

name: TigerEye
long_description: Think Snowflake + Looker + Perplexity.  We take care of your data lake and data modeling, providing one-click access to pipeline, revenue, funnel, and financial metrics with AI-driven insights. We also have out of the box tools for territories and segmentation.  Whether you need your first RevOps or Financial Analyst hire or want to supercharge your existing team, we've got you covered.
one_liner: AI analytics for GTM

name: Stock Unlock
long_description:
Stock Unlock is an investment education and analysis platform, built by retail investors, for retail investors. We make it easy for noobies to start their investment journey, and save time for the pros.

We are building THE place for investors to learn, grow, and invest confidently.
one_liner: Web-app | investment education and analysis tools for retail investors

name: Bifrost
long_description:
We write smart contracts that can automatically transfer assets during end-of-life events.
When you hold your own keys to your own wallet, your funds are lost in worst-case-scenarios. We make an on-chain dead-mans-switch to help your loved ones claim your holdings.
one_liner: Wills and Estate Management for Crypto

name: Sphere
long_description:
Sphere is an AI-powered cross-border tax compliance platform. 

We help companies like Eleven Labs, Replit and Windsurf automate their sales tax, VAT, GST compliance obligations. 

What makes us different to other vendors on the market is: 

1. we have spent the last 1.5 years building local rails into tax authorities in both the US and internationally to properly automate compliance processes (no other vendor has done this), and 
2. we're building the world's first AI-native tax engine (which will be the foundation for a broader cross border compliance platform; think Deel for international billing).
one_liner: AI-powered sales tax, VAT and GST compliance

name: Finnt
long_description: Finnt AI Agents run Controllership and Accounting procedures to accelerate time to close and increase accuracy. ERP-ready journals and financial reports delivered in under 5 minutes, with audit-trail and commentary.
one_liner: AI Agents for CFO and Finance teams

name: AYC Fund
long_description: AYC Fund is web3 VC and web3 liquid fund.
one_liner: Web3 VC and Web3 Liquid Fund

name: Ballerine
long_description:
Ballerine is an Open-source KYC & risk management infrastructure.

How can you use Ballerine?
1. Open-source building blocks (such as UI flows, back office, rule engine, etc.) to customize KYC and risk flows for any use case.
2. Global orchestration of KYC vendors that play nicely with any of our building blocks.
3. For enterprises - compliance coverage as a service. 

Try Ballerine now at - https://github.com/ballerine-io/ballerine

Hit us up with any questions at founders@ballerine.com
one_liner: Open-source KYC and risk management infrastructure

name: Capix
long_description: Capix makes finding private equity firms fast and accurate by aggregating and enriching data from multiple sources into one customizable platform.
one_liner: AI-powered private equity intelligence.

name: Pivot
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Singapore, Singapore
long_description: Pivot helps you visualise, analyse and model your company's financial data way faster than Excel.
one_liner: Your AI FP&A Analyst

name: AlphaWatch AI
long_description:
AlphaWatch AI is an agentic search platform designed for finance and industrial firms. By using custom LLMs, specialized embedding models, and integrating with both trusted external data sources and secure private data, AlphaWatch AI offers a reliable chat interface that cites its sources, saving financial professionals time on research. 

We aim to solve a very real pain point: data is currently disjointed, and knowledge workers lose several hours a day finding and searching for answers in their data. While LLMs should solve this research problem, their results are prone to hallucinations and don't include internal information.

With efficient data integration and valuable insights, AlphaWatch AI is enhancing the way financial institutions and industrial firms access essential information and make informed decisions while maintaining data privacy
one_liner: Agentic search for enterprises with trusted data

name: Levers
long_description: Levers is an accounts receivable management SaaS that helps B2B companies reduce overdue payments, accelerate cash collection, and boost cashflow. Our software integrates with your accounting system and streamlines your AR process using personalized reminders, cross-team collaboration tools, collection performance analytics, and more.
one_liner: Automating collection and boosting cashflow for B2B companies

name: Mogara
long_description:
Mogara automates software R&D capitalization.

We replace accounting leaders chasing down engineers for timesheets with software that plugs directly into the developer workflow.
one_liner: Automatic software R&D capitalization

name: Pyq AI
long_description: Pyq builds AI-powered workflow automation for commercial insurance brokerages. We help them automate 90% of their back-office operations, delivering 400% ROI within 4 weeks and the ability to grow revenue without adding (and even shrinking) headcount.
one_liner: AI automation for insurance brokerages

name: Palomma
long_description: Palomma builds vertical AI agents and payments for residential property managers and developers to help them sell more and automate their operations. Their first three agents focus on inbound leasing, outbound sales and collections (+ embedded payments).
one_liner: AI Agents for Residential Property Managers & Real Estate Developers

name: Dataglade
long_description: Dataglade is the smart way to research stocks. Our AI generates clear analyses and financial models for any public company, and our fundamental data fulfills almost every research need. We save investors hours every day by eliminating the need to manually dig through financial filings. Customers trust our reports because every number is backed by citations to our proprietary financial data warehouse. We inform $1+ billion of trades every day, and we’re just getting started. Check us out at dataglade.com.
one_liner: The smart way to research stocks.

name: Chart
long_description: Chart's Unified Tax Record API provides a direct bridge to tax records from the IRS, state tax agencies, and major tax preparation platforms such as TurboTax and H&R Block.
one_liner: Realtime Access to Verified Tax Records

name: Fintool
long_description: Fintool.com is a financial copilot for institutional investors. It’s ChatGPT on top of financial documents. Fintool is engineered to discover financial insights that are beyond the reach of human analysis or search software.
one_liner: Financial copilot for institutional investors

name: Retape
long_description: Automating call center operations at debt settlement companies, with AI that plugs into CRM, identifies debts to settle, and negotiates with creditors over the phone.
one_liner: AI workers for debt settlement

name: Mantys
long_description: Mantys helps SaaS companies calculate and forecast their ARR accurately in real time without using multiple spreadsheets. For example, NextBillion uses Mantys to pull data from HubSpot and Chargebee and create real-time views of their Contracted ARR, Billed ARR, Churn, and forecasted ARR
one_liner: ARR Reporting and Forecasting for SaaS companies

name: Unstatiq
long_description: There are billions of dollars of hospital waste caused by inefficient, disconnected supply chains and finance data. Today, clinics are facing unprecedented backorders, recalls, and purchase verticals (medical devices, SaaS, security, commodities). We are building a single product to 10x a fragmented industry with each tool built almost 20 years ago.
one_liner: Single source of truth for your clinic's finances and supply chain.

name: Benchmark
long_description: Benchmark is the trusted AI platform for investment firms. Today, leading firms use Benchmark to screen deals, extract insights from unstructured data, and automate workflows. Our platform combines cutting-edge AI with deep industry expertise to help investment firms make smarter, faster decisions across their entire deal lifecycle.
one_liner: The trusted AI platform for investment firms

name: Casca
long_description:
Casca is an AI-native platform transforming small business lending by enabling banks and lenders to originate 10x more loans with 90% less manual effort. Our solutions streamline the entire loan process—from customizable application forms and secure applicant portals to AI-powered assistants, automated document collection, KYB checks, and underwriting. We’ve found product market fit and are scaling our team very quickly.

Small businesses are the heart of the American economy. Many banks shy away from providing funding because of the manual effort in pursuing those deals. With us, that changes. We unlock affordable, quick bank funding for the 30M+ small businesses in the US who would otherwise be subject to the high interest rates from predatory online lenders.

We are a world-class team of banking & AI experts from Stanford, MIT & Y Combinator. We like to win and we know that the only thing between us and the title is our own ability to improve every day.
one_liner: Make Banking Magical

name: Catamaran
long_description: Catamaran uses AI to help people make clearer, faster decisions about risk. Our platform brings all internal and external risk data into one easy-to-understand workspace. By automating data gathering, checking, and scenario testing, we help insurers, reinsurers, brokers, and investors quickly understand and manage their risks. Catamaran also provides a regulated marketplace to easily buy, sell, and manage insurance coverage.
one_liner: The AI-powered risk decision platform

name: Carousel Technologies
long_description:
Carousel is an AI assistant for Excel that builds spreadsheets & models in minutes, not hours.

Carousel can:

- Create & edit Excel models of any complexity, including but not limited to: multi-statement financial models with several tabs, FP&A templates based on raw revenue and cost data, scientific data analyses, and more

- Take in data from PDFs, CSVs, presentations, and images, and build the data into your Excel directly

- Walk you through complex spreadsheet architecture and each cell's precedents and dependents

- Format your models tastefully & professionally

- Build chart dashboards to visualize your data

It's more useful than the last intern you hired.
one_liner: AI Assistant for Excel

name: Meticulate
long_description:
Meticulate is a new type of prospecting engine that uses GenAI to radically improve how revenue teams can find and track their prospects.

We help sales teams find complex customer profiles like “commercial real estate groups focused on hospitality that own over 10 full-service hotels in North America” and track custom buying signals like “recently hired a DevOps leader”. Meticulate is a seed-stage startup backed by leading AI investors like Y Combinator and Link Ventures.
one_liner: Powerful prospecting engine for revenue leaders

name: OmniAI
long_description:
Omni turns documents, slide decks, websites and more into the data you need. You'll never need to copy + paste data into spreadsheets again.
- Connect to a database or document store. We support Snowflake, Postgres, Google Drive, S3 and more.
- Transform your data - Define type safe schemas to run against your unstructured data. We’ll run those models against your data, and keep your warehouse in sync as new rows/fields are added/deleted.
- Query with SQL - All the transformed data stays in your warehouse. Surface this data in your product, or analyze with your existing BI tools.
one_liner: Automate document workflows

name: Double
long_description: Double lets anyone design and invest in their own stock index that’s advised, managed and tax optimized by Double.
one_liner: Design Your Own Stock Index

name: Clarum
long_description:
Clarum is an investment due diligence and research platform designed for private equity investors. It connects directly to a firm’s data sources, structures key financial metrics and deal terms, and performs analysis with AI across Excel, Word, and PowerPoint—mirroring the approach of an associate conducting due diligence.

Clarum is trusted by private equity firms, family offices, venture capital groups, and consulting teams. We automate major parts of the diligence workflow, enabling faster insights and better risk coverage.
one_liner: Investment Due Diligence & Research, Accelerated by AI.

name: Model ML
long_description:
Team:
Chaz: Founder of Fat Llama YC S17 - Acquired by Hygglo. Responsible for Business and Sales 
Arns: Founder of Fancy S20 - Acquired by Gopuff, Responsible for tech and product.
one_liner: AI Workspace for Financial Services.

name: Bayesline
long_description:
Bayesline is building a GPU-powered financial analytics suite for institutional investors, like hedge funds. 

Clients use our cloud deployed solution to build custom analytics in seconds, having previously been frustrated with off the shelf solutions that don't generate any alpha. What used to take weeks or months now happens near instantly. 

Sebastian, CFA (ex Bloomberg Quant & AI Research) and Misha, PhD (ex BlackRock Managing Director) met while working at BlackRock in 2016. With a combined 20 years of experience in the space they set out to change the way the industry uses analytics - from one size doesn't fit all to truly tailored to clients' needs.
one_liner: Highly customizable and blazingly fast analytics for asset managers.

name: Decisional AI
long_description: Decisional Knowledge Engines accelerates due diligence, fundamental research, and portfolio management for private market financial professionals through an AI-native workspace in a secure sandbox with auditable citations. Firms including Evooq, Meetperry, and Borgman Capital leverage Decisional to transform mountains of sources into finance-grade memos, models, and charts in custom formats within minutes instead of days.
one_liner: AI Native workspace for financial professionals

name: Elevate
long_description:
Elevate is a platform for roll-ups to overcome the data challenges that cripple acquisitions and block access to the latest AI technology. We handle hair-on-fire data migrations, provide a centralized repository for cross-portfolio data aggregation, diligence, and analytics, and enable our customers to quickly access and experiment with the latest agentic AI solutions. 

Our experience is at the intersection of finance x tech. As a VP in Private Equity, Scott Cara, the CEO of Elevate, experienced data challenges first-hand and through his vast network of private equity investors and operators. Jeff Day (CPO) and Steve Mazzari (CTO) are experienced software engineers with decorated backgrounds in data, finance, and start-ups. The founding team has been friends for every a decade. 

Our customers are private equity-backed roll-ups. Roll-ups have become an increasingly popular value creation strategy in private equity as $0.5T+ of dry powder intersects with a wave of baby boomer retirements. But roll-ups need to be integrated to realize synergies. That’s where Elevate comes in – we enable our roll-up customers to realize synergies faster through data integrations and AI automations, allowing the team to focus on deal-making and growth.
one_liner: AI-powered data management for roll-ups

name: Modus
long_description:
Modus helps companies hire and retain only the people they need instead of becoming bloated messes. Modus connects your HRIS, ATS, and analyzes extensive data across your organization so leaders can detect, inspect, and correct their workforce plans - without relying on spreadsheets or complex systems. 
 
Lin experienced these challenges firsthand as a VP BizOps at HashiCorp, scaling from 100 employees to IPO, while Chris and Amar faced similar issues scaling 40+ person teams as a fractional CTO. They’re motivated by the belief that companies should have the least number of employees possible.
one_liner: Unlock revenue per employee with AI-powered headcount management

name: FINNY AI
long_description:
FINNY is building a new operating system for independent financial advisors, and starting by helping them grow.
 
Our goal is to empower the best financial advisors (the independents!) to serve all Americans who want financial advice.  We are starting with growth, which is the most existential problem advisors face. 
                                                                                                                                                      
The organic growth process is highly inefficient and full of noise. Advisors often waste 60 hours of business development to convert 1 new client.  

At FINNY, we are certain we can do better with AI. With our tool, advisors can:
- Identify prospects within their target niche, aggregating thousands of data points per lead
- Prioritize prospects based on their predicted likelihood of converting, a score unique to each advisor and prospect pair
- Automate the outreach and meeting scheduling with their high priority prospects

In essence, doing all the work for the advisors, and letting them focus on what actually matters, the client relationship.
one_liner: The OS for independent financial advisors

name: Thyme
long_description:
There are 300k+ financial advisors in the US using a digital Rolodex to manage their client relationships, and it's time for a makeover.

At Thyme we are building the OS for financial advisors that allows them to automatically take notes in meetings (in-person, online, and phone calls), manage their client records with the help of AI, and offer a client portal where clients can track their assets, manage tasks, and even pay for their services. 

Our users have replaced their legacy CRMs and billing solutions with us while deepening their clients' relationships thanks to our client portal and AI tooling that puts rich context at their fingertips.
one_liner: The OS for financial advisors

name: Blaze
long_description: Blaze (YC S24) is global Venmo for cross border payments. It's a peer to peer payments app that uses USDC to make payments fast and cheap between any two people anywhere in the world. The founders scaled their last startup to $1M in ARR, studied mathematics and engineering at Duke, NYU, and Cornell, and have led teams at Spotify, Artsy, and Bitpanda. They're live in the US and Mexico, available for download on iOS and Android: https://blaze.money
one_liner: Global Venmo for cross border payments

name: PathPilot
long_description: Fintechs, banks, and other institutions managing financial services face constant pressure to reduce costs, enhance customer experience, and ensure regulatory compliance. PathPilot provides the speed of pre-built AI agents combined with the flexibility of full customization. This enables internal teams to remain in full control—designing, deploying, and governing AI solutions independently, without reliance on external vendors.
one_liner: AI platform helping fintech/bank teams scale efficiently

name: attimet
long_description:
We’re building a research lab that puts its ideas to the test in one of the most complex, information-rich environments in the world: the financial markets.

Much of trading still depends on hand-crafted signals and intuition. We’re approaching it differently - from first principles. We design systems that learn, adapt, and improve with data. Our infrastructure is built to accelerate research: fast iteration loops, real-time feedback, and direct connection between ideas and outcomes.

We’re starting with liquid markets like equities and options - high-dimensional, dynamic systems where traditional pipelines break down. Our goal isn’t just to model them better - it’s to build a platform for experimentation, where every result tightens the loop between theory and practice.

If you care about learning systems, clean abstractions, and applying research in the wild - we’re hiring.
one_liner: we predict stuff

name: Keye
long_description:
Keye is an AI software that lets private equity firms do due diligence for acquisitions faster and more accurately. Our customers can evaluate 10x more deals and fund better companies which leads directly to better returns/more alpha.
--

Our system is the first of its kind to instantly generate complex, comprehensive data packs from raw data in any format, directly from the data room. This enables investors to gain an 80% understanding of a potential deal within moments, empowering them to say No to a deal earlier in the process and focus on high-potential opportunities. Traditionally, creating these detailed data packs—like cohort or retention analyses and customer roll-forwards—takes weeks, during which critical details may be overlooked, potentially costing funds millions in missed insights and poor decisions.
--

Keye combines cutting-edge AI with deep private equity expertise to deliver powerful, multi-layered insights that go far beyond the simple summarizers and search functions offered by other tools. Our platform dives deep into both quantitative and qualitative due diligence data, offering high-impact analytics crafted specifically for private equity workflows. This isn’t just automation—it’s a purpose-built solution that uncovers actionable insights, fueling smarter decisions and driving true alpha.
one_liner: The Smartest Private Equity Investor

name: Trace
long_description:
We started Trace because we believe AI should wow customers, not frustrate them. As a result, we prioritize reliability and seamless customer interactions. 

Trace AI agents resolve calls end-to-end, securely integrating with bank systems and external APIs. So far, our agents handle quoting, application, and transaction tracking calls for our partners — but we’re still searching for new exciting use cases.

Question to all fintechs/banks: Which customer requests keep coming back to you? We’d love to learn how you handle them now and if they are ripe for automation.
one_liner: Voice AI Customer Support for Financial Services

name: Tejas AI
long_description: Tejas AI eliminates uncertainty, allowing decision-makers to develop and evaluate credit rules more quickly and effectively.
one_liner: Risk Decisioning Platform for Banks

name: finbar
long_description: finbar is the AI investment analyst used by several top-20 (AUM) hedge funds. It automates financial modelling, research, and data analysis so multi-million-dollar decisions can be made 100x faster.
one_liner: The AI investment analyst

name: Trata
long_description: Trata is an AI-powered research desk for hedge funds. We use agents to interview hedge fund analysts, write investment research, and distribute this through a subscription.
one_liner: AI-powered research desk for hedge funds

name: Bystreet
long_description: Bystreet is where deals are found.
one_liner: Automate deal origination with AI agents.

name: Demeter
long_description: Demeter is the AI platform to maximize private investment returns. It enriches portfolio data with deep research to automate performance tracking and benchmarking for value creation.
one_liner: AI Value Creation Team for Private Equity

name: TamLabs
long_description: TamLabs transforms Microsoft Word into an AI-native document editor. Our plugin enables instant document changes with git-style previews, automated comment implementation, and formatting preservation.
one_liner: Cursor for Microsoft Word

name: Serafis
long_description:
Serafis is a search and discovery engine for long-form content. Our AI knowledge graph turns under-indexed data into structured market intelligence — starting with podcasts.

We help investors and operators:
• Accelerate research
• Surface new insights
• Distill signal from noise

We are already live with five organizations managing over $40B in capital. Our library features >10,000 curated transcripts featuring top investors, Series A+ founders, and public company CEOs — searchable by person, company or theme.
one_liner: The AI knowledge graph for institutional investors

name: IronLedger.ai
long_description:
IronLedger provides AI agents for property accounting, starting with accounts payable. We eliminate 100s of hours of expense work for 1000s of multifamily units every month. Soon, we'll be providing end-to-end accounting services including automated billbacks, month-end close and bank reconciliation.

https://www.ironledger.ai/
one_liner: AI agents for property accounting
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
